attributes.action: Marcus Rashford deserves an MBE for his Free School Meals campaign!
attributes.additional_details: To give Mr. Rashford an MBE.
attributes.background: Marcus Rashford deserves an MBE for his Free School Meals campaign.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.  

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: https://www.gov.uk/honours.
